title: (x) Art Nouveau-style "Falcon" - Arnold Boecklin {Yves}
content:
Hi there!  
I think it is easy but I can’t remember the name of this font… can you help me please?  
Thanks!!!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [falcon.jpg](http://web.archive.org/system/files?file=falcon.jpg) | 2.54 KB |
author: trahald

comments.content:
Arnold Boecklin is from Adobe.  
You can get as a shareware in one weight at DaFont under the name [edited by moderator].  
It is also filed under [edited by moderator].

Oh friends, exact and quick!!!  
Thanks!!!!!

Hi Oystein, you probably didn’t know — so no harm done — but there’s an unwritten rule at Typophile that you can’t link to rip-offs or pirated copies of commercially available fonts. I edited out the names in your post (probably way too late, but what the heck).

Could you please make sure not to do that anymore in the future? Thanks. :-)
